title: Less Heat, Horror Steeps: Brutal Second Week of Vuelta a España Will Pile Pressure onto Ragged Peloton
content:
Close to 20,000m climbing in the leg-snapper grades of the northern mountains could blow the GC apart another half-dozen times.

Read the full article at Less Heat, Horror Steeps: Brutal Second Week of Vuelta a España Will Pile Pressure onto Ragged Peloton on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
